verses.name: Genesis 48:10
verses.text: Now the eyes of Israel were dim for age, so that he could not see. And he brought them near unto him; and he kissed them, and embraced them.

verses.name: Genesis 48:11
verses.text: And Israel said unto Joseph, I had not thought to see thy face: and, lo, God hath shewed me also thy seed.

verses.name: Genesis 48:12
verses.text: And Joseph brought them out from between his knees, and he bowed himself with his face to the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 48:13
verses.text: And Joseph took them both, Ephraim in his right hand toward Israel’s left hand, and Manasseh in his left hand toward Israel’s right hand, and brought them near unto him.
